cleaned_text: Jeremy Jacobs and family have given $30 million to University at Buffalo's medical school, which will be named the Jacobs School of Medicine and Biomedical Sciences. "A gift of this size, from someone of Jacobs' stature, sends a message to other prospective donors that UB's medical school is worth supporting financially," said [Michael E. Cain, MD](https://medicine.buffalo.edu/faculty/profile.html?ubit=mcain) , vice president for health sciences and medical school dean.
